name: places/ChIJ1XWeAxVawokRaXWPLYrJcfs
formattedAddress: 6 East River Piers, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 6 East River Piers, New York, NY 10004, USA

originalText.text: What a neat experience. They have a very well run operation. We were in and out in a timely manner. Our pilot was fantastic. It felt safe. And yes it’s a lot of $ for just a 20min ride, but I suppose you try buying a helicopter, hiring a pilot, securing the airspace, getting a heliport, meeting all the safety regulations, and charging less. Seemed like a pretty fair deal for what we got.  The views are amazing.

text.text: What a neat experience. They have a very well run operation. We were in and out in a timely manner. Our pilot was fantastic. It felt safe. originalText.text:
I really don't have enough words to describe how unbelievable this experience was.  It's not the cheapest thing to do, but it is worth every single dollar / penny. We picked 'The Ultimate Tour' flight which lasted 20 mins.
The staff at the Heliport were all lovely. The pilot not only flew the helicopter, but also commented on the buildings and points of interest which made the flight even more special.. This was a birthday treat, but I would definitely do it again. As you can see from the photos, we did the flight during daylight hours, maybe next time it will be a night flight.. Thank you again for a memorable birthday experience.

originalText.text:
Of course a helicopter flight around the Statue of Liberty and over de Hudson is an awesome experience. No doubt about that. The pilot made it even more special. He was a great guide.
If you have never been on a helicopter I would recommend it with 5 stars. In that case you get two awesome experiences. If you already had the pleasure to fly a helicopter before, you might want to reconsider. There are other awesome things you can do with 200+ bucks.

originalText.text: Booked a helicopter flight through HeliNY and it was just the best experience. Was checked in quickly, and provided with lifejacket and then went to wait in a comfortable waiting area. After a brief wait and a safety video we were lead onto the helipad to get in the helicopter. The tour itself was breathtaking, offering amazing views of New York, the pilot was excellent adding a little flourish to each sweeping turn and also pointing out everything that we could see from the helicopter. The helicopter itself has floor to ceiling windows which allows amazing visibility of the stunning views outside. It is quite a short trip but one you'll never forget. Really recommend it!

originalText.text: A must do tour! Staff provided excellent service and ensured we understood every phase of the process and safety instructions. Amazing views and our pilot pointed out points of interest the entire ride up the river and back down. They snap a group picture by the helicopter right before boarding for purchase as well.
